topic.title: Simple and effective.
topic.body:
Make it simple and alot.

You want to get your message out, your politics, your brand, whatever. 
Do not make it complicated. That is boring and people will not be interested.
It is the difference between:
"Healthcare today is very expensive, my campaign will seek to make the program single payer  assisted bix watermelon with very much intent towards X and Y and Z"
And
"Make healthcare cheap again"

What gets repeated gets remembered.
Understand that your message has to be  out there. You can give someone the best advice in the world but if you do not repeat it, people will forget.
